casebody.data:
BROWN
v.
MILLSAP. No. 640A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 12, 2004. Philip H. Cheatwood, for Millsap. T. Craig Wright, Whiteville, for Brown & Nobles. Jaye Bingham, Raleigh, for Nationwide Insurance Company.

Motion by Nationwide Insurance Company for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief has been filed and the following order entered:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of January 2004."
